mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK_MEMBER (id, pass, name,email,address,cell,home) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{name},#{email},#{address},#{cell},#{home})
mapper.select: SELECT A.id,A.name,A.email,A.address,A.cell,A.home, B.borrowdate, B.returndate FROM BOOK_MEMBER as A ,BOOK_BORROW as B WHERE NOW() > B.returndate AND B.borrowcheck ='2' and A.id=B.id;
SELECT A.name, A.score, A.id, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK_BORROW B WHERE B.borrowdate > date_sub(NOW(), interval 30 day) AND B.id=A.id ) AS numborrow FROM BOOK_MEMBER AS A ORDER BY numborrow DESC
SELECT *, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK_BORROW B WHERE B.borrowdate > date_sub(NOW(), interval 30 day) AND B.id=A.id ) AS numborrow FROM BOOK_MEMBER A ORDER BY team
